channel.title: Age of Empires 2 Tournament #1 STARTS TODAY
channel.description:
This tournament is going to start at 7pm (GMT +2) today, i will be randomizing the team line-up's and it will be a 2vs2 ladder tournament.
Rules:
Resources: Medium Map Type: Random Map Style: Random Game Speed: Fast Civilization: Your Choice Starting Age: Dark Age Record Game: On (This is to ensure nobody is cheating and let other players see the games when done)
[b]You must screenshot the achievements page after game, we will have winners in different categories, such as Military, Economic, etc.[/b]
You may practice vs other participants by joining the following hamachi network:
Network Name: dicklord Password: dicklord
Joining irc will help as well, join the channel #rts on irc.moparisthebest.com
Ventrilo will be used: IP: 202.60.73.134 Port: 5285
If you wish to take part in this, post a message here and i'll add your name to the thread.
[b]Current Players:[/b] Speljohan Jimmy Friddy Niall Alex Cowie` MrsSweeper Freddy1990 Peter
I wish all participants good luck!

You must screenshot the achievements page after game, we will have winners in different categories, such as Military, Economic, etc.
